channel.title: Altijdgeslaagd
channel.description:
Hello guys,
I've been working on a project that is meant to help people get their driver's license where I've been programming in Unity3D and modeling in 3ds Max. The application is functioning good from registering to logging in and answering questions. Only problem is that I've been looking for a modeller for some time, have been asking people, they promised to make something but never did..
I'll show you some of the pictures of the app, it's in dutch because the company that asked me to make it is located here in The Netherlands.
I'm looking for a modeler that could model me some roads, traffic lights, houses, t-junctions, roundabouts, basically everything you'd see in traffic but in dutch style such as the following:
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/ygo5y.png[/img]
The company that wants this app made doesn't seem to care to make it exactly the same as an existing app but with their name on it and their style. But that's not of my business, he wants it, I make it.
If anyone wants to volunteer or knows anybody that could give me a helping hand, that would be awesome!
More photos of the app that I've made:
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/339ixyu.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/693sw0.jpg[/img]
[youtube]https://youtu.be/D3hLY8GeUqA[/youtube]
Thanks for your attention!

item.title: Altijdgeslaagd
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

Those are fine, people aren’t really focused on the border of the signs. It’s all good if they’re good visible. I’m still looking for a good 3dsmax (FBX) modeller for this project. Hook me up with someone if you can!

Read full topic

item.title: Altijdgeslaagd
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

Try working on the borders of your models,
Other than that, it looks really good.

Read full topic

item.title: Altijdgeslaagd
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

Hello guys,

I’ve been working on a project that is meant to help people get their driver’s license where I’ve been programming in Unity3D and modeling in 3ds Max. The application is functioning good from registering to logging in and answering questions. Only problem is that I’ve been looking for a modeller for some time, have been asking people, they promised to make something but never did…

I’ll show you some of the pictures of the app, it’s in dutch because the company that asked me to make it is located here in The Netherlands.

I’m looking for a modeler that could model me some roads, traffic lights, houses, t-junctions, roundabouts, basically everything you’d see in traffic but in dutch style such as the following:

ygo5y.png640×1136

The company that wants this app made doesn’t seem to care to make it exactly the same as an existing app but with their name on it and their style. But that’s not of my business, he wants it, I make it.

If anyone wants to volunteer or knows anybody that could give me a helping hand, that would be awesome!

More photos of the app that I’ve made:

339ixyu.png720×1280

693sw0.jpg720×1280

[youtube]https://youtu.be/D3hLY8GeUqA[/youtube]

Thanks for your attention!
